A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Theres more bad to say than good. As an avid star wars fan from being a young boy I have to say I am hugely let down this movie. When I watch Force Awakens\, i feel like it is star wars\, but this\, i feel like it's more of a (badly done) spin off. The character development of Finn Rey and Poe is alright but Poe lacks any involvement really. \n\nTo summarise\, I would rate this as the worst of all star wars movies and Rian Johnson should hang his head in SHAME. I am hoping that JJ Abrams will direct the next one.
